name: Better Hype Machine aka Hypem
description:
• Various UI, font, & color tweaks to better resemble a music player

• Moved user menu & search bar for better access when window is pinned to half screen

• Eliminated distracting & unnecessary elements for a much cleaner look

• Aesthetically pleasing interface that highlights the current song being played in a light green shade as well as alternating grey and white boxes to make it easier to differentiate songs when scrolling

• Other miscellaneous changes for an overall more pleasant experience Also check out my nightmode theme based off this style: https://userstyles.org/styles/148360/better-hype-machine-aka-hypem-nightmode
additional_info:
update 1.1
• Fixed player controls & heart location for better consistency
• Minor UI tweaks & cleaner code

update 1.2
• Bigger now-playing font
• Fixed a border issue on the Popular page

update 2.0
• Rewrote code for compatibility with their new interface. It seems like they are experimenting a ton with their new interface so things may break or look strange over the coming weeks. I'll do my best to try and keep up
• As always, removed distracting elements to better resemble a music player

update 2.1
• Minor update - changed the Now Playing (Artist & Song Name) font to Helvetica with a bigger font size + more padding for better readability
• Removed Sponsored Tracks

update 3
• Color tweaking and better placement of User Menu & Search bar
• Removed some ads (Support Us ads & Bandcamp integration)

 ***Please support this site if you like their service! Removal of ads are strictly a cosmetic choice.
Their support-us page can be found here: https://hypem.com/support-us
